method.name: Instance and Feature Selection based on Coopertive Co-evolution

reference.ref: J. Derrac, S. Garcia, F. Herrera, IFS-CoCo: Instance and Feature Selection based on Cooperative Coevolution with Nearest Neighbor Rule. Pattern Recognition 43:6 (2010) 2082-2105.

generalDescription.howWork: IFS-COCO is a coevolutionary model composed of three populations: One performs Instance Selection, a second one perfoms Feature Selection, and the last one performs Dual Selection (Instance and Feature Selection simultaneously). The performance of the preprocessed reference sets is evaluated throughout a k-NN wrapper.

parameterSpec.param: Population Size: Size of the populations.
K : K parameter in the k-NN classifier.
Max Evaluations: Maximum number of evaluations.
MODE: Cooperation mode (use all populations or only a specific one).
Alpha: Alpha balancing parameter of the fitness function.
Beta: Beta balancing parameter of the fitness function.
prob0to1: Probability of changing bits to 1 during the crossover phase.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: IFS-COCO-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8666666666666667 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8666666666666667 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9333333333333333 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.04666666666666667 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.05206833117271103 Correctly classified: 0.9533333333333334 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= iris Summary of data, Classifiers: iris Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.962962962962963 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9777777777777777 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9703703703703703 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.9481481481481482 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.9481481481481482 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.030370370370370374 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.011688691731895918 Correctly classified: 0.9696296296296296 Global N/C: 0.0
